actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce with amendment, S. Rept. 94-571.

actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the documentation of the vessel Bruja Mar as a vessel of the United States with coastwise privileges.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce with amendment, S. Rept. 94-571) Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel, Bruja Mar, to be documented as a vessel of the United States with the privileges of engaging in coastwise trade, so long as the vessel is owned by a citizen of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the documentation of the vessel Bruja Mar as a vessel of the United States with coastwise privileges.
